meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Meghan Phillips David Rigsby Nilanka Seneviratne Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7515.

td.p: Meghan Phillips, a library & archives assistant from Lancaster, Pennsylvania
David Rigsby, a Social Security Administration attorney from Alexandria, Virginia
Nilanka Seneviratne, an international development nonprofit professional from Washington, D.C. (whose 1-day cash winnings total $7,601)

tr.td: U.S. HERSTORY
LITERATURE
ALMA MATERS
CROSSWORD CLUES "D"
SCHWARZENEGGER
IT'S NOT A TUBER!

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: It had to do with the infamous Dreyfus Affair in France.)

$5,001
DavidWhat is Madame Bovary?
$2,000
NilankaWhat is the Dreyfus Affair
$8,301
J\'accuse')
